scripts.test:coveralls: lerna run build && nyc mocha "libraries/bot*/tests/*.test.js" && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.set-dependency-versions: node tools/util/updateDependenciesInPackageJsons.js ./libraries ^${Version} botframework-streaming botbuilder botbuilder-choices botbuilder-dialogs botbuilder-core botbuilder-prompts botbuilder-testing botframework-connector botframework-config botframework-schema testbot && node tools/util/updateDependenciesInPackageJsons.js ./transcripts ^${Version} botframework-streaming botbuilder botbuilder-ai botbuilder-dialogs botbuilder-testing
scripts.update-versions: lerna run set-version && npm run set-dependency-versions
